attributes.action: to make difibulators available in all public areas such as supermarkets shopping centres,pubs,clubs any area where there is public involved
attributes.additional_details: i suffered sudden cardiac arrest in april this year and without the help of a friend and the emergancy services i wouldnt be alive today,i now want to try make difibulators available in public areas such as supermarkets,shopping centres,pubs,clubs anywhere where the public may be at risk of sudden cardiac arrest

rejection.details: Please see: Provide defibrillators to every well populated public place in the UK
